title: [Self-directed] Development and Application of Cognitive Load Assessment Tools for Learning Formal Definitions in Extreme Conditions

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental concepts of function continuity and limits
context.additional_context: Research-based curriculum monitoring formal definition learning processes in individual digital device project environments, systematically evaluating cognitive load

learning_goals: Learners will develop the capacity to self-assess cognitive load levels experienced during proof processes using extreme formal definitions on a 5-point scale
Learners will revise personalized learning strategies based on cognitive load data collected in PBL environments
Learners will establish a cognitive framework for understanding the validity and reliability of Rasch model-based assessment tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
